full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA BKRA SHIS GA-YAS 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (CES KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA BKRA SHIS GA-YAS 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BYANG PHYOGS HOR GYI YUL LA DGE LDAN RING LUGS DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I PHYIR, P'A RIN GYI SA'I CHA DGON SDE KUN MKHYEN GLING DU RJE YAB SRAS GSUM GYI @023A *, ,SKU GZUGS BZHES TE, CHOS 'PHRUL SMON LAM CHEN MO'I DUS CHEN BCO LNGA'I NYIN DANG 'BREL ZHAL ZAS RGYA MTSO MAS GTZOS STONG MCHOD PHUL SKABS, ,LAS SMON BZANG POS 'BREL BA'I SKU SKYES BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS DNGUL MAndAL LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS RANG LO SO BRGYAD PA, 'PHAGS YUL LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD DU BA H'UM BH'A BYA, TIS KUS MI BDAG GI MDUN PAR WU YIN, STOD 'GREL PA RNAMS KYI LUGS LA 'BRU MANG PO STE,  SA PHO STAG GI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL LEGS TSOGS DAR RGYAS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN 'JAM MGON BLA MAS RJES SU 'DZIN RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,PAR BRKO BA SO NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG DGE TSUL DPAL GYI SNYING PO'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
